alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 5:38PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brevard and east central Osceola Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 538 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Camp Holly Fish Camp, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Satellite Beach, Camp Holly Fish Camp and Merritt Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
